updateSalon.salonNameMustBeAtLeast: Salon name must be at least 3 characters
updateSalon.phoneNumberMustBeAtLeast: phone number field must be at least 6 numbers
updateSalon.whatsAppMustBeAtLeast: whatsApp number field must be at least 6 numbers

Photos.doesNotHaveAccessToYourPhoto: saloTime does not have access to your photo. to enable access , tap Settings and turn Photos on

updateSalon.explainingOnBreakTimeContent: The break time helps you to not lose any of your clients, in fact gain more clients instead of just waiting around. When you have a long service for a certain client of yours and need that client to process until ready for you to finish her hair, you can choose a break time. This is where you accept another client until your other one processes and is ready for you to look at. (You just gained another client during your break time)
updateSalon.explainingOnBreakTimeAfterContent: Rest time is intended if you feel like taking a break between each service. Your customers can't see the rest time and no one can make an appointment on the rest time you set
updateSalon.exitFromSalonWithoutSaveMsg: Are you sure you want to exit from update Salon without save?

intagramInsturction.step3: Press on 3 points on the right side

facebookInstruction.step2: Press on 3 points near the Edit photo

updateSalon.missingServiceOrNeedHelp: you didn't find your service or need help?
updateSalon.exceededMaxEmployees: You exceeded the maximum number of employees allowed
updateSalon.AcceptAppointmentInfo: Every customer who makes an appointment must wait for your confirmation.

MySalon.invisibleBody: customers can no longer book an appointment nor view your salon. Only you as the salon owner can view your salon and book upcoming appointments to your schedule, are you sure you mean it?
MySalon.visibleBody: When you open your salon, customers can now view your salon page and  book appointments with you, are you sure you mean it?

welcomeToSaloTimeDialog.title: Welcome to Salotime
welcomeToSaloTimeDialog.sentence2: Grow your business and manage your appointments on the go
welcomeToSaloTimeDialog.sentence3: Say good bye to phone tag, Double Booking and no shows!
welcomeToSaloTimeDialog.sentence4: Book services online 24 hours-7 days a week
welcomeToSaloTimeDialog.sentence6: Set Reminders for all salon owners and clients
welcomeToSaloTimeDialog.sentence7: Organize your appointments faster and save more time for you and your clients
welcomeToSaloTimeDialog.sentence9: The more clients you make the more benefits you will recieve with Salotime App
welcomeToSaloTimeDialog.sentence10: The more ratings you get, the more Salotime will help you to market and grow your buisiness globally

Notification.autoAcceptInfo: By clicking on auto accept, you allow your customers to make an appointment without your confirmation.
Notification.autoAcceptMsg: The customer can now make an appointment without the need for your approval

salonUsers.autoAceeptEmptyMessageHeader: When you auto accepts your customers, their name will appear here
salonUsers.autoAcceptEmptyMessageBody: Auto accept allows you to accept their appointment only once that way when they book again with you they no longer need to wait for approval and their name will appear here.
salonUsers.pendingEmptyMessageHeaders: When your customers make an appointment, their name with basic details will appear here
salonUsers.pendingEmptyMessageBody: Check back soon and your Customers will be waiting for you to accept their appointments

deleteAccountContent.body: we're sorry to hear you want to delete your account. when you press the button below, your photos, comment and other data will be removed and will not be recoverable.

privacyContent.body: Once you go private, Customers can no longer book an appointment nor view your salon, Only you as the salon owner can view your salon and book upcoming appointments to your schedule.

ThemesContent.changeSalonDesign: Change your salon design for your customers
